mapper.select: select RV_DATE AS rvdate,RV_RDCODE AS rdcode,RV_ROspCode AS rospCode,RV_RONUM AS rvronum,RV_CONTENT AS rvcontent,RV_STAR AS rvstar,RV_COMMENT AS rvcomment from( select rownum rn ,RV_DATE,RV_RDCODE,RV_ROspCode,RV_RONUM,RV_CONTENT,RV_STAR,RV_COMMENT from rv where RV_USID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where rownum <= 3

select ZZ_spCode as zzspCode,sp_location as location,SP_TOPIMG as sptopimg from( select rownum rn, ZZ_spCode,sp.sp_location,sp.SP_TOPIMG from zz INNER JOIN sp on ZZ_spCode = sp_code where zz.zz_usid = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where rownum <= 3

select SP_CODE as spCode,SP_CTCODE as spctcode,SP_NAME as spname,SP_LOCATION as location,SP_TOPIMG as sptopimg from( select rownum rn, SP_CODE,SP_CTCODE,SP_NAME,SP_LOCATION,SP_TOPIMG from sp where SP_HOUSID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where rownum <= 3
